accussed_details.name: Jumo
allegation: Unauthorized possession of 0-3 ghuntas of Bhada land
Illegal grant of land for non-agricultural purposes

complaint_summary: Petitioner challenged the grant of 0-3 ghuntas of Bhada land to the respondent Jumo by the Colonization Officer, alleging the grant was illegal and against government policy.
investigation_summary: The Colonization Officer granted land to Jumo for non-agricultural purposes, which was beyond his jurisdiction. The petitioner filed an appeal against the grant order, which was rejected as time-barred.
judgment_summary: The court found the Colonization Officer's grant order void and illegal as it violated government policy and exceeded jurisdiction. The grant to Jumo was canceled.
punishment: Grant of 0-3 ghuntas to Jumo canceled.
Decision_or_verdict: Revision petition accepted; grant order declared void and illegal.
legal_arguments: Petitioner argued the grant violated Notification No. KB-l/1/30/772/7098, dated 12-5-1975.
Respondent argued petitioner was estopped from challenging the grant due to prior inaction.
Court ruled the Colonization Officer lacked jurisdiction to grant land for non-agricultural purposes.
key_issues: Violation of government land grant policy

maxims.Estoppel: Petitioner was argued to be estopped from challenging the grant due to prior inaction.

legal_terms.Void Order: An order that is illegal and without jurisdiction.
legal_terms.Unauthorized Possession: Possession of land without legal entitlement.

summary_vector_notes: The case revolves around the illegal grant of Bhada land for non-agricultural purposes by the Colonization Officer. The court declared the grant void and canceled it, citing jurisdictional overreach and violation of policy.
